title: tyring to remove "Play tab" icon from tabs using css style sheet but gets ignored?
content:
.tab-icon-overlay[muted], .tab-icon-overlay[playing], .tab-icon-overlay[soundplaying] { 

   display: none !important;

}

doesnt seem to read it i have toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets set to true

i made the chrome folder, checked the names of everything, everything seem correct? what am i doing wrong?
creator: maxtraxv3

title: Bookmarks have disappeared
content:
There was an update today on my PC laptop, I think from FireFox. After the restart, my bookmarks have all disappeared. The instructions to restore them are useless. I go through Menu/Bookmarks/Manage Bookmarks/Import and Backup/Restore/Choose File. THERE ARE NO FILES TO CHOOSE FROM. According to the instructions, there should be some dated entries. Nada.

I tried the Troubleshooting blahblah and that was equally useless.

I'm panicking that I've lost years of carefully organized bookmarks.
creator: mwhite139

title: slow or non-existent page loading
content:
I'm on an older Macbook Pro with OS 10.12.6 My browser says it's up to date.

It seems that ever since I did a sync-up with another Macbook, glitches have appeared on this machine. One thing happening now is that some websites take forever to load in, and others won't load at all. With other sites there's no problem. I have a fiber optic connection. The speed test indicates that all is good. I did reboot recently.

I'm wondering if some sites are using advanced scripts that my older machine doesn't like, or perhaps recent updates from Firefox just don't work as well on this machine. Any suggestions??
creator: rop_nga
